entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS(config: "Release", nativeRelink: False) failing #86533
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.BindCanReadStaticProperty failing intermittently #86532
    Future
  • Can't build runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 (LTS) due to native PGO format #86531
  • System.Text.Json Desrialization to an IParsable<T> #86529
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.ContainsAny{Except} #86528
  • JIT: Try more optimal fixpoint computation strategies for liveness #86527
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `GC.IgnoreTransitionSuppression(void*)` #86525
  • Create and upstream a magic(5) entry for webcil #86522
  • [main] Installer HostActivation/HostModel.ComHost Tests failing in coreclr x86/x64 windows/osx #86520
  • [7.0] Installer build failure: HostActivation Tests in coreclr windows_x86 & coreclr Linux_musl_x64 #86518
  • [Announcement] Minimum .NET SDK version updated to 8.0.100 Preview 4 #86517
  • [HTTP/3] Compare perf for OpenSSL 1.1 vs OpenSSL 3+ MsQuic versions on a same machine #86516
    8.0.0
  • Unnecesary use of GCHandle in Windows Socket code #86513
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IServiceStartup.StartupAsync()` to support pre-startup scenarios #86511
    8.0.0
  • ReadOnlySequence GetPosition does not respect slice boundaries #86509
  • [API Proposal]: Event when a HttpResponseMessage is complete #86502
  • JIT: Physical promotion readback mechanism does not take implicit control flow into account #86498
    8.0.0
  • [debugger][mono] Multithreading debugger failures #86496
    8.0.0
  • [System.Data.Odbc] Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString() #86490
  • NullReferenceException when deserializing object containing nullable struct using source generator #86483
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Upgrade VMs to Ubuntu 22.04 #86480
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Regression in JsonPlatform due to AVX-512 changes #85543
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-collect failing because MicroBenchmarks builds are failing #86258
  • Unsafe.BitCast/As does not remove stack spilling for custom SIMD type #86448
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - blazor run tests failing #85769
    8.0.0
  • Linking an empty .NET MAUI app produces inconsistent binaries #86242
  • [wasm] blazor perf builds failing #86165
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With .Net 8 Preview4, 'GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8007000E' on Linux Arm32 #85757
  • Synchronous calls in XsdValidatingReader #78802
    Future
  • CI failure in JitBlue/GitHub_85129/GitHub_85129.cs: CS0260: -Missing partial modifier on declaration of type 'Program'; another partial declaration of this type exists #86514
  • LoggerMessage source generator generates uncompilable code when used with '@' prefixes #86499
    8.0.0
  • Quic should support OpenSSL 3.x #81801
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests CertTests.RaceDisposeAndKeyAccess failing #85073
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.dll #86263
    8.0.0
  • InternalGetCustomAttributes, dictionary is not needed #86507
  • [AOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1123: Failed during conversion to COFF: Invalid or corrupted file #86493
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F` lowerings in JIT. #80865
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F.VL` lowerings in JIT #80867
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512DQ` lowerings in JIT. #80870
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512CD` lowerings in JIT. #80869
    8.0.0
  • Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512BW` lowerings in JIT. #80868
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the performance of microbenchmarks #77046
    8.0.0
  • [API proposal]: add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments. #66450
    Future
  • [browser] Split dotnet.js and introduce loader + emscripten modules #85045
    8.0.0
  • Add CreatePeriodicTimer() to TimeProvider via Microsoft.Bcl.TimeProvider #86489
  • Memory leak after configuration disposal from PhysicalFileProvider #86146
    8.0.0
  • Static registrar with NativeAOT design – discussion #80912
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Array.IndexOf / Span<T>.IndexOf very slow on .net 7 #78008
    8.0.0
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync loop counter #86135
  • Improve debugging experience of ClaimsPrincipal #86421
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2184548 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [interp] Remove char element type support from transform-simd #86534
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Apply the SourceWriter pattern to the STJ source generator. #86526
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • avoid GCHandle in ConnectEx and SendTo on Windows #86524
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Disable JitOptimizationSensitive check on NativeAOT testing #86523
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid ToString allocations for each ISpanFormattable value in string.Concat/Join(..., IEnumerable<T>) #86521
    area-System.Runtime
  • [RISC-V] Temporary exclude infinite tests. #86515
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Turn webcil off for .NET < 8.0 #86505
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • [jiterp] Low threshold jiterpreter CI run #86500
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Unreachable filter end #86492
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    needs-area-label
  • fix(66229): Fix invalid processing of empty Dictionary node. #86485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure Vector2/3/4, Quaternion, and Plane don't have a false dependency on Vector<T> #86481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Remove centos 8 images #86478
    area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Remove centos 8 images #86477
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Refactor our linear collection marshalling implementation #86519
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Ensure we use bytes, not bits #86510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix marking of saved assemblies #86474
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove fgMorphCastedBitwiseOp #86491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: Fix firefox debugger tests failure #86476
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • We should not establish a heap hard limit for 32 bit platforms #85844
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Upgrade gcc CI to use gcc13 #86051
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Enable event pipe tests in NativeAOT CI run #86389
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter v128 misc optimizations #86506
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove invalid assert in EvpPKeyDuplicate #86503
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade build to use .NET 8 Preview 4 SDK #86408
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix mapping of redeclared type parameters #86353
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Use net6.0 SqlClient TFM under source-build #84782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][debugger][docs] How we run debugger tests #86495
    documentation, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments #86346
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Update Wasm SDK pack version in workload manifest #86382
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • enable TieredPGO by default #86225
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • [wasm] Generate jiterpreter feature detect modules dynamically #86401
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • remove [DebuggerDisplayAttribute] from ref assemblies #86443
    area-System.Xml
  • FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it #86455
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2183857 #86468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove getMaxIntrinsicSIMDVectorLength from the JIT/EE interface #86479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] Repair interp simd's ability to find certain operators; support vectors of char #86475
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move the GCC and CLR Tools Unit Tests legs to use the global build template #86411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add debugging attributes to System.Security.Claims types #86424
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement I2 and I4 shuffles in the jiterpreter #86469
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Updated

  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Allow using active host context in hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate #86460
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Restore removed API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lots of tweaks to FrozenDictionary/Set analysis and hashing #86293
    area-System.Collections
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono] When creating an array type, don't do full initialization of the element type #85828
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Update ILCompiler paths to handle PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #85996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize constant i2/i4 shuffles in jiterpreter #86470
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Refactor name convention #86446
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs in the test set 'System.Runtime.Tests' for loongarch64. #86435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How can I use this repo to replace a web extension in JavaScript? #2249
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: reinstate PHASE_EXPAND_STATIC_INIT #2257
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: export for NativeAOT_StaticInitialization automatically #2259
  • [AOT7.0]A type initializer threw an exceptio #2280
  • aot 8.0 throw System.MissingMethodException #2278
  • [AOT]LINK : fatal error LNK1123: 转换到 COFF 期间失败: 文件无效或损坏 [ #2281
  • Failed to load assembly 'System.Private.ServiceModel' #2279

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasi tracking #2269

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge runtime to 17 May 2023 #2283

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat fails when Roslyn's dependencies move past our own. #32691
  • `wasi-experimental` doesn't support Linux Arm64 #32686
  • APICompat tests fail with non english locale #32682
    Backlog
  • dotnet pack fails using UseArtifactsOutput=true with multi-targeting and global usings #32675
  • ServiceController's API got wrong service status #32668

Closed

  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
    Discussion
  • NETSDK1100 blocks building on Linux #3592
    Discussion
  • Build Issue with Latest SDK 7.0.302 #32637

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix StaticWebAssets Brotli asset deduplication #32700
    untriaged
  • [Blazor] Support loading the Blazor WebAssembly SDK when targeting net8.0-browser #32688
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update SDK in global.json to upgrade WebAssembly tests #32687
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • add two artifacts-output-related-telemetry properties to emitted events #32685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2183899 #32664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update MSBuildLocator version #32698
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32657
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Add warning for optional workload EOL #32658
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Containers/Layer: trim x-bit based on filesystem permissions on Unix. #32606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers/CreateNewImage: don't change the user to root when ContainerUser is empty. #32594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Self Constraint #5413
    Likely Never
  • Champion "return, break and continue expressions" #867
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update caller-argument-expression.md for improved syntax highlighting #7211
  • Update inline-arrays.md #7208
  • Update primary-constructors.md based on recent LDM decisions #7207

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostics stop working when '#line hidden' is used in unrelated code #68275
  • use git sh.exe exec dotnet publish --framework net7.0 -r win-x64 -c xx #68274
  • Renaming a variable name has issue in new version of Visual Studio #68273

Closed

  • Possibility of improving error recovery for switch expressions with unclosed pattern's `}` or `]` #67876
    Backlog
  • Items sticked over the top due to sticky scroll does not highlight in expected way when hovered #68271
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider #68207
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33718.278 #68266

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a builder type to update SyntaxAndDeclarationManager.State #68278
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure that we always run all diagnostic suppressors for single file analysis #68270
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68268
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add interceptors feature flag #68241
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement runtime capability check for inline arrays feature. #68272
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68269
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Mark 17.6 APIs as shipped #68221
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Remove unnecessary casts #68257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix infinite loop in highlight refs. #68259
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #68265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix inconsistencies around MemberNames #68262
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix 'ctor' snippet in nested class #68177
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48336
  • Allow parametrizing `_blazor/initializers` location in `Blazor.start()` #48335
  • OkObjectResult with generic type parameter #48324

Closed

  • .net8 preview 4: Hosting environment not detected via Blazor-Environment header #48271
    8.0-preview5
  • Quick grid does not render in .net 7 blazor server project #48292
  • Blazor Server App suddenly throws error in blazor.server.js: Range Offset is outside the bounds of the DataView #48216
  • Consider not using the wall clock time for timeouts in Kestrel #13628
    Backlog
  • Onboard aspnetcore into the new TimeProvider type from runtime #47472
    8.0-preview5
  • Quarantining StreamPool_Heartbeat_ExpiredStreamRemoved #37862
    Test failures
  • VariableLengthIntegerHelper returns incorrect value on consumed parameter #48203
  • RequestDelegateGenerator fails to detect route pattern that uses a constant for its value #48307
    8.0-preview5
  • Blazor - Cannot implicitly convert type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ElementReference' when upgraded to VS 17.6.0 #48327
  • Support all ProblemDetail types in the multi response types for generating swagger docs MinimalApi #47623
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging by overriding ToString #39792
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Add some notes on testing trimming #48333
    area-infrastructure
  • DO NOT REVIEW Stress test x509 test #48332
    needs-area-label
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • [blazor] Read appsettings loaded by the runtime into the VFS #48326
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `2bc2374` to `3881d5a` #48329
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bb2941f` to `cb455a7` #48330
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add debug output to HttpContext and friends #48293
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Remove static analysis for route parameter in RDG #48320
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deep Link for Android with .Net Maui error - Error when navigate other page #15192
  • Latest update to Visual Studio for Mac breaks CollectionView #15189
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #15184
  • [iOS] Border appears to be offsetting content incorrectly #15183
    .NET 8
  • Flow Direction updates are ignored in Android #15182
  • Error on Visual Studio Mac (Latest Version) #15181
  • Navigation between top level pages fail in Unpackaged WinUI application #15180
  • Support for Proxy in HttpClient in iOS #15179
  • Android crash when using iframe from spotify (maui blazor) #15178
  • iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #15177
  • Splash screen icon shrink when using State Manager on iPad #15175
  • Implicit style not reflected to target property when add implicit style at runtime #15174
  • The overlay when displaying Shell Flyout is not drawn correctly when the screen is rotated on iOS. #15173

Closed

  • VerticalStackLayout inside Scrollview: Button at the bottom not clickable on IOS #14257
    Backlog
  • CA1416 no longer fixed by OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast(XX) on MAUI 7.0.86 #15032
  • [iOS] ContentViews and Grids not rendered properly in right-to-left cultures #15095
  • Animations doesn't work on Android 11 device #15049
  • System.Drawing.Primitives, Version=7.0.0.0 error on Android 11 device #15050
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #13600
  • CollectionView SelectedItems not rendering on android until scrolling #7726
  • RadioButton on Windows not respecting margin #8116
    Backlog
  • CollectionView not updating when direct content of ContentPresenter #7770
  • The foreground stop running when application is not in foreground #15161
  • Shell Flyout can't change background color and cancel rounded corner #15130
    Backlog
  • Unable to load font 'monospace' #11422
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.86] [iOS/Catalyst] Grid issue with calculating * values on iOS/MacCatalyst #15018
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193

  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187

Merged

  • Enable MacCatalyst for the Apple Sign In Authenticator #15188
  • Small fixes for uitest project location and install #15172
  • Fix ContentView RTL #15114

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.5.0 to 17.6.0 #15134
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15135
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Tests and fixes to verify that spanned views are including spacing in measurements #15119
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Allow to use system fonts #15010
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Account for padding when expanding * rows/columns to new sizes #15143
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
